name: Tasting Flight
description: A simple but well-balanced tasting flight of different families and flavors.

name: Signature Trio
description: A unique dish expressing one family in multiple taste variations.

name: Harmony Roll
description: Three distinct families wrapped in one taste — perfect for sushi-style spreads.

name: Plain Trio
description: Three ingredients from the same family and taste, yielding a flat but serviceable plate.

name: Chef's Plate
description: A crafted composition from a single family with subtle flavor diversity.

name: Family Quartet
description: Four distinct families coming together with varied tastes for a rich special.

name: Fusion Quartet
description: A fusion of two core families and distinct flavors blending cultures and ideas.

name: Symphony
description: A perfect flavor ensemble from one family, balanced across all taste tones.

name: Plain Quartet
description: Four matching ingredients that play it safe, resulting in a muted experience.

name: Mosaic Feast
description: Five distinct tastes woven through a patchwork of culinary families.

name: Grand Feast
description: A grand abundance of diverse ingredients and flavors from all families.

name: Grand Course
description: A refined centerpiece dish, unified in family but layered in taste.

name: Masterpiece
description: The ultimate creation — one family, every flavor, pure culinary art.
